page.title: 03PLEASURE BOATS IN ST.ERNEY
page.content: With a grant from{COSIRA }The owner of Boating World is hoping to establish a cottage industry.When asked if he would be likely to expand he replied with a most definite{"YES". The industry has already found a potential mascot,an old barge,which was used during the days of the { {"SECOND WORLD WAR."}The barge still remains at the very same place where it was sunk. Approximately eleven people have been employed here and the firm is currently involved with making fibre glass dinghys and boats using the "old fashioned method."
